plot: A Puppet show for adults. Born with external hemorrhoids, Piggy suffers from low self-esteem, and cowardliness. When the evil Confucius kidnaps Mother Pig... Piggy must learn to embrace his deformity... or risk losing his Mother forever.
title: Piggy
plot_es: A Puppet show for adults. Born with external hemorrhoids, Piggy suffers from low self-esteem, and cowardliness. When the evil Confucius kidnaps Mother Pig... Piggy must learn to embrace his deformity... or risk losing his Mother forever.
